name: Your Name
title: Cloud Engineer | Software Developer
summary: Passionate Cloud Engineer and Software Developer with expertise in designing and deploying scalable cloud infrastructure. Experienced in GCP, AWS, containerization, and Infrastructure as Code. Strong background in building production-ready applications with focus on reliability, security, and cost optimization.

responsibilities: Designed and deployed cloud infrastructure on GCP using Terraform
Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments
Reduced infrastructure costs by 40% through optimization strategies
Migrated legacy applications to containerized microservices on Cloud Run
Developed full-stack web applications using React and Node.js
Integrated third-party APIs and payment gateways
Implemented automated testing and code quality checks
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in Agile environment
Built responsive web interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Participated in code reviews and team knowledge sharing

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Specialization in Cloud Computing and Distributed Systems

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering
education.description: GPA: 3.8/4.0. Relevant coursework: Algorithms, Data Structures, Operating Systems, Networks

projects.name: Cloud CV Platform
projects.technologies: GCP, Terraform, Cloud Run, Firestore, Python Flask
projects.description: Serverless CV website with visitor analytics and contact form. Deployed using Infrastructure as Code with one-command deployment. Demonstrates cloud-native architecture and auto-scaling.

projects.name: Microservices E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Scalable e-commerce platform with microservices architecture. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, and order management.

projects.name: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Live chat application with real-time messaging, user authentication, and message persistence. Deployed on cloud infrastructure with auto-scaling.

projects.name: Data Pipeline & Analytics
projects.description: Event-driven data pipeline for processing and analyzing large datasets. Automated ETL processes with scheduled jobs and real-time analytics.

projects.name: Infrastructure Monitoring Dashboard
projects.description: Custom monitoring solution for cloud infrastructure with alerting, metrics collection, and visualization. Tracks SLIs/SLOs for production services.

projects.name: CI/CD Automation Framework
projects.description: Automated deployment pipeline with testing, security scanning, and infrastructure provisioning. Reduced deployment time by 70%.
